[vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”bottom” fade_in_opacity=”pix-opacity-2″ pix_over_visibility=”” responsive_css=”{“pix_res_sm_mt“:“-100px“}” css=”.vc_custom_1648452155262{margin-bottom: -60px !important;padding-top: 130px !important;background-color: #2f529e !important;}” fade_in_intro=”20″ b_custom_height=”50px”][vc_row pix_particles_check=””][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1589595508057{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”33788″ img_size=”full” css=”.vc_custom_1646643648760{margin-top: 60px !important;}”]
Certified Digital Marketing Consultant Course

30+ Digital Marketing Modules 130+ Digital Marketing Tools 3 to 5 Months Program

[vc_empty_space height=”10px”]

dCDMC program is a Digital marketing certification course which is divided into 5 segments covering Executive Modules, Campaign Support Modules, Organic & Paid Marketing along with Career Development Modules.

KNOW MORE[vc_empty_space height=”109px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ responsive_css=”{“pix_res_sm_mt“:“-100px“}”][vc_single_image image=”37580″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1648449813908{margin-bottom: -1px !important;}”]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” css=”.vc_custom_1648455548322{padding-top: 90px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” pix_particles_check=””][vc_column]

Implement A-Z Of Digital Marketing under a Single Umbrella Program

[vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1648451925671{margin-top: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]
[vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text]

Content Depth Advanced

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]
[vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text]

130+ Digital Marketing Tools

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]
[vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text]

3-5 Months Course Duration

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” top_divider_select=”10″ t_2_is_gradient=”true” t_2_color=”#e6f3f7″ t_3_is_gradient=”true” t_3_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.1)” t_3_color_2=”#f7f7f7″ css=”.vc_custom_1645781071244{background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_row pix_particles_check=”” css=”.vc_custom_1646727287708{margin-top: 140px !important;}”][vc_column]

Study Through Award-Winning LMS Along with Live Class Training

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” pix_particles_check=”” css=”.vc_custom_1645779982233{padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1559101053478{padding: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text]
Easy Explainer Videos
Learning Progress
Take Certification Tests
Quizzes & Assignments
1 Click Content Access
24*7 Availability, On the go
[/vc_column_text] VIEW CENTER[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”37590″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” css=”.vc_custom_1648455410651{margin-top: -35px !important;padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 210px !important;background-color: #2a50a3 !important;}”][vc_row pix_particles_check=””][vc_column]

Digiperform Reviews: What our Trainees Say about Us?

Our Courses have Been Receiving an average rating of 9.4/10 from our course participants. Till date, Digiperform has trained more than 24,000+ individuals.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” pix_particles_check=”” pix_visibility=”1″ css=”.vc_custom_1646133134777{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_video link=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H3vgxrm1DWw” align=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_video link=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sk3r2AYgBRc” align=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row pix_particles_check=””][vc_column content_align=”text-center” offset=”vc_col-md-offset-1 vc_col-md-10″]
SEND ME A BROCHURE
[/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” top_divider_select=”20″ t_2_is_gradient=”true” t_2_color=”#e6f3f7″ t_3_is_gradient=”true” t_3_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.1)” t_3_color_2=”#f7f7f7″ css=”.vc_custom_1646042549429{margin-top: -130px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” pix_particles_check=”” css=”.vc_custom_1646042490941{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″]
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1559101053478{padding: 30px !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”25px”]

Digiperform Students Trusted by over 100+ of the World’s Leading Companies

We have a team of enthusiastic members, and Leading organizations preferred Digiperform for their Digital Marketing recruitments.
Start with a Free Demo
[/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” top_divider_select=”10″ css=”.vc_custom_1646051126693{background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_row pix_particles_check=”” responsive_css=”{“pix_res_sm_mt“:“-10px“}”][vc_column]

<b>FAQ: Digital Marketing Course</b>

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” pix_particles_check=”” css=”.vc_custom_1645779982233{padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1559101053478{padding: 30px !important;}”]
[vc_column_text]dCDMC is one umbrella certification in Digital Marketing, Which is the combination of digital marketing fundamentals, Campaign planning & improvement strategy, Organic and Inbound Marketing Modules, Paid marketing Modules and Career Driven Modules. It’s a combination of about 5 different digital marketing certifications combined into 1 and offering in-depth training in 30 Modules.[/vc_column_text]
[vc_column_text]Anyone Looking to learn each and every aspect of digital marketing whether a fresher, working professional, business owner or even a freelancer can attend this course.[/vc_column_text]
[vc_column_text]The candidate must possess basic computer and internet literary skills to efficiently take this program.[/vc_column_text]
[vc_column_text]We do have flexible batches for working professionals you can choose from early morning, late evening, weekends or Sunday only batches. The schedule and availability depends from centre to centre.[/vc_column_text]
[vc_column_text]This course has a combined curriculum of 320 hours which involves about 120 hours of classroom training and rest of the hours dedicated towards mandatory assignments, doubt sessions, self study and examinations. For Weekday batches have a Span of about 2 months and weekend 3-4 months.[/vc_column_text]
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″]
[vc_column_text]Each session is divided into 33-50% of class exercises, In addition there are hand-ons assignments that a student completes using over 120 digital marketing tools. To support the student assignments we also provide you with support videos of course content. In Addition you also get ad budget to run advertising campaign online in every batch to get live campaign management experience.[/vc_column_text]
[vc_column_text]
Digiperform Certification Training is offered at our “Authorised Learning Centres” across India. You can visit the one near you or contact them online to find batch details and join.
[/vc_column_text]
[vc_column_text]You will get dCDMC- “Certified Digital Marketing Consultant Certification” After This Course. With this training you’ll be also able to appear for following Digital Marketing certificates:
  • Digiperform Certified Digital Marketing Consultant Course (dCDME)
  • 5 Google Adwords Certification
  • Google Analytics Certification
  • Shopping Advertising Certification
  • Mobile Advertising Certification
  • 2 Facebook Certification
  • 5 Hubspot Academy Certification
  • Bing Certifications
[/vc_column_text]
[vc_column_text]Majorly both are same. These are two different terms but course content is same. Though theoretically, digital marketing can cover few more concepts of digital mediums like SMS, NFC, Qr codes etc. whereas internet marketing focuses only on internet-based mediums.[/vc_column_text]
